data.description: Translate between FITS and generic headers
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There is currently no module that does translations between FITS
    headers that are specific to one astronomical instrument and generic
    headers. This will allow for more generic and portable code to be
    written.

    This module slots perfectly under the Astro::FITS namespace as it
    deals with astronomical data (thus Astro) and specifically FITS
    headers (thus FITS).
